CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Transfer_Complete__c ) ,IF( Transfer_Status_Calc__c <1, "", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 15, Transfer_Status_Calc__c * 40)) & IF(Transfer_Status_Calc__c <7,IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 15, 200- (Transfer_Status_Calc__c * 40)),""),IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 15, 200)&" Completed "&TEXT( Transfer_Complete__c )&":")&" "&TEXT( Transfer_Status_Calc__c )&" Sections Completed"
CustomField.label: Transfer Status
